subject: RE: [junit] Emulating JavaScript in HTTPUnit
msgSnippet: ... You d need some Javascript emulation software for that. If you don t need to test your Javascript, can t you simply emulate clicking the post to bar link
messageBody:
>It would be great if I could tell HTTPUnit to select the 'Post to bar' link
>and have it actually run the JavaScript....

You'd need some Javascript emulation software for that.

If you don't need to test your Javascript, can't you simply emulate
clicking the "post to bar" link by constructing the URL that would have
been created had that link been pressed? --jk
